title: Choose the plan that's right for you
description: Join StreamVibe and select from our flexible subscription options tailored to suit your viewing preferences. Get ready for non-stop entertainment!

pricingList.name: Basic Plan
pricingList.description: Enjoy an extensive library of movies and shows, featuring a range of content, including recently released titles.

pricingList.name: Standard Plan
pricingList.description: Access to a wider selection of movies and shows, including most new releases and exclusive content

pricingList.name: Premium Plan
pricingList.description: Access to a widest selection of movies and shows, including all new releases and Offline Viewing
